price: Ampa sε, Yεde Nwoma no (Tora) maa Mose sεdeε (Israel mma no) benya kwankyerε.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba laʿallahum yahtadūna
